mapper.select: select DISTINCT project_flows.project_id, project_flows.flow_id, projects.name as project_name from project_flows,projects where project_flows.project_id=projects.id
mapper.insert:
insert into project_flows
flow_id,
project_id,
version,
modified_time,
encoding_type,
json,
